TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FontSubsetterCommitPolicies extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the granularity at which font glyph subsets are saved in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When font glyphs for text in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document are saved in the document package, the document text displays identically on any computer or printer. If glyphs are not saved in document and the required font is not installed on the local computer or printer, the rendering device must substitute glyphs from another font. Substituting glyphs can change the appearance of the text when a different font is used.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies CommitEntireSequence = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Store all glyphs that are used in the text by each document sequence.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies CommitPerDocument = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Store all glyphs that are used in the text by each document.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies CommitPerPage = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Store all glyphs that are used in the text by each page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: No subsetting. Store all glyphs for all fonts used in the document.
